room_title: Escape room "Haunting On The High Seas" by Last Second Escape in Richmond (VA)
room_description:
Legend has it, a mysterious wrecked ship is out there and no one has been able to find it. There are stories that this ship has many treasures on board. After winning a map in a lucky hand of poker, you and the crew set sail hoping to find these valuable jewels.
After a long journey, you and the crew spot a wrecked ship still half afloat and pinned against the rocks of an unknown island. You aboard the vessel only to find out there is a reason why this treasure is still on board.
